body.p:
KEY PROJECTS
Provided end-to-end consulting for the Electronic Thesis and Dissertation (ETD) process from ingesting of digital files to long-term preservation of digital assets
Analyzed metrics such as editorial errors, YouTube views, ETD page views, and ETD template downloads over time to track success of varying student resource types, publication timing, and other factors, to identify gaps in the ETD training program
Advocated for multiple conduits of outreach which resulted in 400+ graduate students actively engaging through YouTube screencasts, and online and in-person seminars
Migrated ETD submission policy from optional to mandatory with buy-in from stakeholders across several departments
Reviewed 50+ ETDs of graduate students per semester to provide feedback on compliance with publication standards

ACCOMPLISHMENTS
Instrumental in decreasing ETD draft submission errors by 47% through corrective measures executed after discovery of training gaps from data analysis
Earned the 2012 FIU Sustainability Award for improving institutional efficiency and presented at the USetdA conference to show how data analytics can be effectively leveraged to contribute to the success of innovations to ETD training programs
